From Peragro Tempus Wiki

T



Peragro Tempus is a multiplayer online role-playing game with a persistent world, which evolves according to nature and its inhabitants (players and NPCs).


This Wiki is mostly use for Game Mechanics and settings related articles but also has other interesting items.

Currently we have 339 articles and 6,013 edits made by 60 users and still we need your help making this Wiki as complete as possible.

You can help us in various ways. Below is a list of things you can do to help.

  • Expand articles in Category:Stub.
  • Check and possibly remove Category:Deprecated articles.
  • Fix Categories or Articles.
  • Work on templates and info boxes to improved editing.
  • Updating articles to make use of Semantic MediaWiki features.
  • Check and update the complete category tree.
  • Regularly patrol the following pages: Uncategorized categories/pages, Wanted categories/pages, Broken/double redirects, Short/long/dead-end/orphaned pages.
  • And not to forget creating new articles.
